body:
Well, i did one before but it got deleted when the website restarted so i decided to make a new one :)

Story:

Well, im 15 and i played MC for a long time. My first server i ever joined was OCN. I typed in "good servers in minecraft" and it camr up to me. After my 1 year mark past, i went on to Avicus, i found it on the OCN forums and i waz liek "gotta check this out" Luckly, it had nebula which is like Project Ares and i was more used to it. I do not really care about the past confilcs with Avicus and OCN. I just came here to haz fun. Avicus is less intense for me so i play here now!

In general, i am more good with a bow. Not bow spamming but good at sniping. You can see my bow records on meh profile. Sword, i suck at it only cuz i play on a 0-30 fps laptop with optifine and my ping constantly changes from low to high :(

So ya, thats me! So ask me anyrthing

title: Y0urm0m1's AMA

replies.body:
Story behind your name? =P
What's your favourite Nebula map? And why is it your favoute?

replies.body:
Story: Um i was young and i was immature so i wanted my name to be 

Yourmom

I decided to put mumbers to make it kewl so i did

Y0urm0m

It was taken so i was to lazy to find another username so i just added a 1.

Y0urm0m1. Boom


Fav map: I would say Rendevous or Quintus
